dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2006 5:11 PM
To: Dave.Sole@Militis.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] copyright violation
Date:         Tue, 28 Feb 2006 14:15:13 -0800
From:         Dave Sole <Dave.Sole@Militis.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         abuse@chanceweb.com







February 28, 2006





Notice of Copyright Violation:



To Whom It May Concern:

I am the Copyright Agent for Norealis Media Inc., owner of U.S. Male Corps
registered trademarks in the United States and other countries, U.S. Male
Corps web site ( http://www.MaleCorps.com), and U.S. Male Corps films and
photos.

All the photos below are copyrighted by U.S. Male Corps and no permission
has been granted to you for publication. Your use of these photos is not
authorized by U.S. Male Corps, and as a result, is illegal.





http://www.gaycommune.com/forum/index.php?act=module&module=gallery&cmd=view
image&img=101422

image&img=36353

http://www.gaycommune.com/forum/index.php?act=module&module=gallery&cmd=view
image&img=21518

http://www.gaycommune.com/forum/index.php?act=module&module=gallery&cmd=view
image&img=16391

http://www.gaycommune.com/forum/index.php?act=module&module=gallery&cmd=view
image&img=14360





















The photos were taken from the U.S. Male Corps web site and the copyright
information removed, demonstrating the intent to violate copyright laws. The
photos are produced by, and published on, U.S. Male Corps web site (
http://www.MaleCorps.com). All rights for any material on U.S. Male Corps
web site are reserved.

As you have now been notified of this copyright violation, we require that
the above pictures be removed within 72 hours of receipt of this notice.



Willfully violating a copyright for the purpose of commercial advantage or
financial gain is a criminal offense. As per section 1204 of the DMCA,
penalties range up to a $500,000 fine or up to five years imprisonment for a
first offense, and up to a $1,000,000 fine or up to ten years imprisonment
for subsequent offenses.



Please take notice that we reserve the right to seek, without any further
notice, damages in the amount of $1 to $5 per photo illegally used, per news
group member, and per day, starting 72 hours after your receiving of this
notice.

I hereby certify, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this
notice is accurate to the best of my knowledge, and that I have complete
authority to enforce U.S. Male Corps' rights in this matter.



Yours truly,



/dave sole/

Dave sole







        

Security : Intelligence : Protection : Assistance : Development

        



Dave Sole
Executive Assistant
        

Militis Intelligence Corporation
Bag 26
Whistler, British Columbia
Canada V0N 1B0

Dave.Sole@Militis.com
